Name: Beverly Hills Iced Tea
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first five ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and gently stir.
Nutrition: One serving of Beverly Hills Iced Tea contains 222 calories
